solution_line_template: Each breakfast plate has {eggs_per_plate} x {bacon_per_egg} = <<{eggs_per_plate}*{bacon_per_egg}={bacon_per_plate}>>{bacon_per_plate} bacon strips.
The cook needs to fry {num_customers} x {bacon_per_plate} = <<{num_customers}*{bacon_per_plate}={total_bacon}>>{total_bacon} bacon strips.
